//: NOTE: custom asymmetric changes in italian translation. See the 'bw=Black and White|colors=Colors' translation above.

strings.//: NOTE: this is legacy code. We used to have custom keys in the italian template used in VOXmail, so we have to keep using them. See also the custom replacement rules
strings.colors=Cerchio Colorato\n:
Colori=Cerchio Colorato
                |Bianco e Nero=Cerchio Grigio
                |bwb=Cerchio Nero
                |sqbw=Quadrato Grigio
                |sqcolors=Quadrato Colorato
                |sqbwb=Quadrato Nero
                |rdcol=Cerchiate a colori
                |rdbl=Cerchiate nere
                |rdw=Cerchiate bianche
                |sqrdcol=Squadrate a colori
                |sqrdbl=Squadrate nere
                |sqrdw=Squadrate bianche
                |white=Bianche
                |coloured=Colorate
                |black=Nere

custom-row[if].replace: socialIconType neq 'Colori' and socialIconType neq 'Bianco e Nero'
